title: Professional Development and Business Practices for Doulas in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a business plan for a doula practice?
choices: To outline goals, strategies, and financial projections
questions.answer: To outline goals, strategies, and financial projections

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in a doula's pricing structure?
questions.answer: Medical procedures

questions.question: What is the main purpose of a client contract for a doula?
choices: To protect the doula from lawsuits
questions.answer: To outline services and expectations

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when setting up a doula practice in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Local legal requirements

questions.question: What does SWOT stand for in the context of business analysis?
questions.answer: Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically considered a professional boundary for doulas?
questions.answer: Prescribing medications

questions.question: What is a unique selling proposition in the context of doula services?
choices: The lowest price in the market
A feature that distinguishes your services from others
A guarantee of specific birth outcomes
questions.answer: A feature that distinguishes your services from others

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of continuing education for doulas?
choices: Attending a workshop on new comfort measures
Chatting with other doulas on social media
questions.answer: Attending a workshop on new comfort measures

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of networking for a doula in Timor-Leste?
choices: To build relationships and gain referrals
To avoid working with difficult clients
questions.answer: To build relationships and gain referrals

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically part of a doula's marketing strategy?
questions.answer: Providing medical diagnoses

questions.question: What is the main benefit of mentorship for a new doula?
choices: Guidance and support from an experienced practitioner
questions.answer: Guidance and support from an experienced practitioner

questions.question: Which of the following is an important ethical consideration for doulas in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Respecting client confidentiality

questions.question: What is the purpose of creating a professional development goal list?
choices: To plan for ongoing learning and growth
questions.answer: To plan for ongoing learning and growth

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in a doula's business plan?
questions.answer: Medical treatment protocols

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of maintaining professional boundaries as a doula?
choices: To avoid emotional attachment to clients
To ensure clear expectations and appropriate relationships
questions.answer: To ensure clear expectations and appropriate relationships

questions.question: Which of the following is an appropriate way for a doula to handle a client's request for medical advice?
choices: Provide the advice based on personal experience
Refer the client to a qualified healthcare provider
questions.answer: Refer the client to a qualified healthcare provider

questions.question: What is the main purpose of adapting international doula resources for the Timorese context?
choices: To make the information more interesting
To ensure cultural relevance and appropriateness
To impress clients with foreign knowledge
questions.answer: To ensure cultural relevance and appropriateness

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when pricing doula services in Timor-Leste?
choices: Considering local economic conditions and affordability
questions.answer: Considering local economic conditions and affordability

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of participating in local breastfeeding support groups for a doula?
choices: To learn about current practices and challenges
questions.answer: To learn about current practices and challenges

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a recommended way for a doula to market their services in Timor-Leste?
choices: Making unsolicited house calls to pregnant women
questions.answer: Making unsolicited house calls to pregnant women

questions.question: What is the main purpose of shadowing experienced midwives or doulas?
choices: To gain practical experience and insights
questions.answer: To gain practical experience and insights

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when working with traditional birth attendants (daya) in Timor-Leste?
choices: Respecting their role while promoting evidence-based care
Encouraging clients to avoid them entirely
Adopting all of their practices without question
questions.answer: Respecting their role while promoting evidence-based care

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of organizing community discussions on maternal health and doula support?
choices: To raise awareness and educate the community
To compete with other birth professionals
questions.answer: To raise awareness and educate the community

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically a part of a doula's role in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Performing medical examinations

questions.question: What is the main purpose of creating a birth preferences template for the Timorese context?
choices: To ensure all births follow the same plan
To help clients communicate their wishes effectively
questions.answer: To help clients communicate their wishes effectively

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when supporting clients in remote areas of Timor-Leste?
choices: Encouraging all clients to travel to urban hospitals
Providing medical care beyond doula scope
questions.answer: Understanding local resources and limitations

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of studying government health statistics on maternal health in Timor-Leste?
choices: To understand the current state of maternal health
To avoid working in high-risk areas
To set pricing based on health outcomes
questions.answer: To understand the current state of maternal health

questions.question: Which of the following is an appropriate way for a doula to handle a disagreement with a healthcare provider during a birth?
choices: Argue with the provider in front of the client
Encourage the client to ignore medical advice
Quietly support the client while respecting medical expertise
Leave the birth to avoid conflict
questions.answer: Quietly support the client while respecting medical expertise

questions.question: What is the main purpose of creating a professional development goal list for doulas?
choices: To plan for continuous learning and skill improvement
questions.answer: To plan for continuous learning and skill improvement

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in a doula's scope of practice in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Prescribing medications
